data.eml:eml: Description of Helicotylenchus persiaensis sp. n. (Nematoda: Hoplolaimidae) from Iran

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Kashi, Leila, Karegar, Akbar (2014): Description of Helicotylenchus persiaensis sp. n. (Nematoda: Hoplolaimidae) from Iran. Zootaxa 3785 (4): 575-588, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.3785.4.6
